item.title: CVE-2023-29060|2023-11-28T20:31:55.731Z -- becton%2C%20dickinson%20and%20company%20%28bd%29 -- facschorus
item.description: The FACSChorus workstation operating system does not restrict what devices can interact with its USB ports. If exploited, a threat actor with physical access to the workstation could gain access to system information and potentially exfiltrate data.
